m_szDocTitle: Wall Street ends higher as blue chips rally; Intel up late
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Wall Street ends higher as blue chips rally; Intel up late Ryan Vlastelica Send By Ryan Vlastelica NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks ended a volatile session higher on Tuesday, lifted by gains in such blue-chip names as Coca-Cola and Johnson & Johnson, though persistent weakness in momentum names limited the Nasdaq's advance. Coke and J&J, both Dow components, climbed after their results while recent outperformers fell, a sign that investors were rotating from growth stocks into value ones.
